name: Fry Game
description:
You are fry. Get to ketchup.

Controls

WASD/arrows to move, space to jump, mouse to look around

 - - - - - - -

This game was made as a part of the Brackeys 2021 Game Jam, and the theme was stronger together. 

There was a lot more content planned originally, but life stuff happened, and the entire game was made in about a day. I'll blame the jankiness of the controls and overall lack of game on this. 

The Brackeys 3rd and 1st person videos were used for some code, and the "music" was made in BeepBox. Everything else was made in either Unity or Blender.
